title: Annual Education Drive 2026
summary: We are launching our annual education drive to collect school supplies and books for underprivileged students. Join us in making a difference in children's lives through the power of education.

title: Community Health Camp Scheduled
summary: A free health camp will be organized on March 5th at the community center. All community members are welcome to attend for free check-ups and consultations.

title: Foundation Annual Report Published
summary: Our 2025 annual report is now available. Read about our achievements, financial transparency, and plans for the coming year.
